name: A Bigger Fish
description:
Help a fish navigate through dangerous waters. Hunt smaller fish while avoiding larger ones to earn the highest score.

Controls:

Use W, A, S, D or the arrow keys to move. Press space while you are near a smaller fish to eat it for extra score.

Game modes:
  • Endless
  • Campaign (16 levels so far)
The Project

This early prototype was made for the 2022 UNC Collegiate Game Jam, please rate it and give feedback. If there's enough support, I'm planning to further develop the game.

Possible upcoming features:

  • More campaign levels
  • Saved highscore
  • Game settings (e.g. music & sfx volume)
  • More animations
  • In-game tutorial
